column4: hey, quick question. so i update my repo lists, but for some reason it never asks if i want to upgrade to OpenOffice3.0. why (or more importantly) how do you upgrade?
im on 8.10, i dont remember if its LTS
well, 3.0 was abandoned, FYI.  3.1 is in Jaunty.  I'm not sure what happened with backporting it to intrepid...
